entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow and local blowing snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
